completeQuestions: Please take a moment to complete the following questions:
visitRequestSubmitted: Your visit request has been submitted successfully. We will notify you by email with any updates once your request is reviewed and approved.
checkJunkEmail: Note: If you have not received the email in your inbox, kindly check your junk or spam folder.
healthDeclaration: Health Declaration and Visitor Safety Guidelines
loginToContinue: Log in to your account to continue
visitRequestDelay: Visit requests with less than 12 hours notice may experience delays in internal approvals.
personalDataNotice: The personal data that you provide on this page will be used for the purposes of ensuring the safety and security of visitors and staff during visits to MOFA sites. MOFA also uses this personal data to accurately identify visitors upon arrival at MOFA's sites, which may include using the photo provided on this page to verify the visitor's identity using facial recognition.
submitDataConsent: If you are submitting personal data on behalf of other visitors, you confirm that they are aware of this privacy statement and have consented to the submission of their data.
dataProcessingNotice: All data will be processed and stored in accordance with MOFA's privacy and data protection policies. To learn more about how MOFA handles personal data, please refer to our
formSubmissionCertification: By submitting this form, I/We certify that the information provided is true, accurate, and complete to the best of my/our knowledge. I/We understand that providing false or misleading information may result in legal consequences.
visitorPhysicalWorkNotice: AS A VISITOR YOU ARE NOT ALLOWED TO PERFORM ANY PHYSICAL WORK IN MOFA PREMISES
name: Name
deleteAccountConfirmation: Do you want to permanently delete your account?
guidelinesAcknowledgement: Before proceeding with your visit to MOFA premises, you are required to acknowledge and accept the following guidelines:
visitComplianceAcknowledgement: To proceed with your visit, you must acknowledge and agree to comply with the above guidelines:
acceptDeclarationAndGuidelines: I accept the above declaration and agree to adhere to the Visitor Safety Guidelines.
acknowledgementStatement: I/We acknowledge that no external devices or equipment brought on-site will be connected to MOFA's internal systems or networks under any circumstances.
enterIqamaNumber: Enter 10-digit Iqama number as per official records.
enterPhoneNumber: Enter phone number in international format, e.g., 00966XXXXXXXXX.
uploadPassportPhoto: Upload a recent passport-sized photo (JPG, PNG, or JPEG).
ensureClearImage: Ensure the image is clear and meets official guidelines.
uploadIqamaCopy: Upload a clear copy of your valid Iqama (front and back) in JPG or PDF format.
selectDeviceType: Select the type of device you are bringing (Laptop, Phone, Tablet, USB Drive, etc.). If your device is not listed, select 'Other'.
enterDeviceModel: Enter the exact model of your device (e.g., Dell XPS 15, iPhone 13, Samsung Tab S7).
visitDurationLimit: The visit duration cannot exceed 60 days. Please ensure that the end date is within 60 days from the start date.
enterNationalId: Enter 10-digit national ID as per official records.
enterMofaStaffEmail: Enter the email of the MOFA staff member who will be hosting or assisting you.
accountActivationLinkSent: An account activation link has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to activate your account.
passwordResetLinkSent: A password reset link has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.
fillDeviceDetails: Please fill all device details before adding a device.
invalidFileTypeImage: Invalid file type. Please select a PNG, JPG, or JPEG file.
invalidFileTypeDocument: Invalid file type. Please select a PNG, JPG, JPEG, or PDF file.
emailNotRegistered: Provided email address is not registered!
expireVisitError: Visit end date cannot be later than the document expiry date. Please update your visit end date or renew your document.
visitEndDateValidation: Visit end date must be greater than visit start date.
visitingPersonEmailNotFound: Visiting person email is not found!
accountExists: Account already exists! Kindly log in.
noAccountWithEmail: No account exists with provided email address!
passwordCreated: Password created successfully! Kindly log in.
passwordResetSuccess: Password reset successful! Kindly log in.
sureToCancelAppointment: Are you sure you want to cancel appointment?
declareDevicesBroughtOnsite: Declare Devices to be Brought Onsite
verifyNotARobot: Please verify you're not a robot.
emailVerified: Thank You! Your email has been verified.
fileSizeExceedsLimit: File size should be less than 5MB!
passwordSetSignInToContinue: Your new password has been set. You can now use it to sign in to your account.
requestPasswordResetLink: This password reset link is either invalid or has expired. Please request a new password reset.
requestPasswordCreationLink: This password creation link is either invalid or has expired. Please request a new link to create your password.
provideCommentsAllRequestedInfoDevices: Kindly provide comments for all requested info devices.
photoSizeIncorrect: The uploaded photo size is incorrect. Please upload a photo with the correct dimensions.
photoTooSmall: The uploaded photo is too small. Please upload a higher-resolution photo.
Uploaded photo resolution is not supported.
noFaceDetectedPhoto: No face was detected in the uploaded photo. Please ensure face is clearly visible.
multipleFacesDetected: Multiple faces were detected in the uploaded photo.
faceTooSmallPhoto: Face appears too small in the uploaded photo.
photoTooDark: The photo is too dark. Please improve the lighting.
faceTooBlurry: The face is too blurry in the uploaded photo.
faceNotProperlyAligned: Face is not properly aligned in the uploaded photo.
photoAlreadyUsed: Uploaded photo has already been used.
photoFaceAlreadyExists: A photo with this person’s face already exists.
This face has already been registered with the same name.
enterOTP: Please enter the OTP (One-Time Password) sent to your registered email to login.
invalidExpiredOtpTryAgain: The OTP you entered is incorrect or has expired. Please try again.
enterPlateNumberUpto6Digits: Enter a plate number with up to 6 digits.
tooManyRequestsTryAgainLater: Too many requests. Try again later.
notAuthorizedToPerformAction: You are not authorized to perform this action!
